htmlbody:
Overview

SDCN, Sustained Dialogue Campus Network, was created by the president of IISD and runs off of the same principle. The participating college students are using this process to effectively handle separation throughout their campus communities. College campuses currently participating in this process are: Princeton University, the University of Virginia, Dickinson College, the University of Notre Dame, Colorado College, the University of Alabama, Denison University, Northwestern University, Vanderbilt University, St. John Fisher College, Cornell College, University of Richmond's Law School and other campuses engaged in Sustained Dialogue.

http://www.sdcampusnetwork.org
title: Sustained Dialogue Campus Network
